title: Vanram pan hlimte zai ru rei a ni dawn lo ve
lyrics:
Vanram pan hlimte zai r'u, rei a ni dawn lo ve,
Ka rinna van lam hawiin fak hla nen a chho ve;
Malsawmna tlang ropui tak chungah chuan ka ding a,
Jordan lui ral ka thlir ka hmu a ram tiam chu.

ang lovin zai rem rawh u, in rimawi tinreng nen,
Thinlung lawmin a khat e, fakin ka khat liam thin;
Bang lovin aw zai rem r'u, in rimawi tinreng nen,
Thinlung lawmin a khat e, fakin ka khat liam thin.

Vanram pan hlimte zai r'u, he leia cham chhung hian,
Isua leh van lam hla chuan in nite hmang liam r'u;
A tlan hmangaihna chawia hla ropui chu sain,
Chatuan thunawn ropui chuan van sang a nghawr vel a.

Vanram pan hlimte zai r'u, a rei tawh dawn lo ve,
Kan Pa rama hla mawi zawk kan sakna hun tur chu;
Tah chuan hmangaih ten minn nghak, hima min lawm turin,
Lui ralah khian kan tawk ang, tui fawn a awm tawh lo'ng.
